devices_included: Phone; Public display; Tabletop, large horizontal display
use_cases_desc: The application area is museums, but the interactions or the user interface is not further specified.
contribution_desc:
The paper describes a technical concept for multi-device use in museums where users can connect their own devices to interact with museum exhibitions.

Interesting link to matrix comparing 25 museums by target group, supported devices, and the type of applications: http://meeteux.fhstp.ac.at/assets/matrix/
